data.text: @MEFoggyDog @WoollerEmma @TinyWriterLaura I have read the dizzy is one of the new symptoms with the B.2 variant. Gosh I hope you feel better. My husband just had what we thought was covid but 5 tests later all negative. Not sure maybe a sinus infection??
@TinyWriterLaura UK Gov says don't isolate, it's all over, WTF? Thank you for caring enough to keep all of us safe.
@TinyWriterLaura GOOD! Glad the inhalers are helpful for you.
@Megatherioidea Stable now thanks! I haven’t had a nasty drop for a couple of weeks as long as I use my inhalers, so that’s a positive ☺️
@renudhinakaran Thank you! I may take you up on this 🥰
@TinyWriterLaura That's a rough one. Much empathy from me, as it took me forever to kick it, too. How are your overnight oxygen levels?
@TinyWriterLaura If you are looking for suggestions for post Covid asthma and dysautonomia I'd be happy to share.
@TinyWriterLaura @renudhinakaran And yet sad for the lingering asthma and dysautonomia ... but it is really wonderful to see improvement!
